content: only page 3 cuff **i like to go down to a us 0 2 0mm needle for the cuff so it pulls in more and stays snug on my leg *k2 p2* around for 10 rounds or desired cuff length about the designer i have been knitting for more than half of my life and do it as much as i possibly can my motto is knitting not just a hobby but an obsession if you have any questions about the pattern you can find me on ravelry com as ananzi or email me melissa@meltrandesigns com my website is http //meltrandesigns com/ © mel-tran designs 2012 all rights reserved for personal use only page 4
